trans-unit.source: Arranges <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> items inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Dispone elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel> determines which <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> items will fit inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> and which must be put in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel> determina a quali <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> elementi verranno inseriti in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> e che devono essere inseriti nell'area di riversamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.OverflowMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property determines how items should be distributed between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.OverflowMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà determina come gli elementi devono essere distribuiti tra le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" /> assumes to position its children.
trans-unit.target: Dimensione assunta da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" /> per posizionare i propri elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Arranges and sizes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> items inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Dispone e ridimensiona elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The measurement constraints; a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" /> cannot return a size larger than the constraint.
trans-unit.target: Vincoli della misurazione. <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarPanel" /> non può restituire una dimensione maggiore del vincolo.
Misura nuovamente il riquadro di una barra degli strumenti.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the panel.
